params.poolIds: An array of pool IDs to allocate capital to.
An array of pool IDs to claim rewards from.

deallocateFromPool(uint256).details: Realizes any losses incurred since the request before completing deallocation.

params.poolId: The ID of the pool to deallocate from.

onCapitalDeposited(address,uint256).details: Updates the underwriter's total pledge and their pledge in each allocated pool.

onCapitalWithdrawn(address,uint256,bool).details: Realizes losses before processing the withdrawal for each pool.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

realizeLossesForAllPools(address).details: Can only be called by the RiskManager contract, typically before a liquidation or withdrawal.

params.user: The address of the underwriter to realize losses for.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

requestDeallocateFromPool(uint256,uint25.details: Initiates a notice period before capital can be fully deallocated.

params.amount: The amount of capital to request for deallocation.
params.poolId: The ID of the pool to deallocate from.

setAddresses(address,address,address,add.details: Can only be called by the owner. Essential for protocol operation.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

allocateCapital(uint256[]).notice: Allocates the underwriter's entire capital pledge to one or more pools.

claimDistressedAssets(uint256[]).notice: Claims distressed assets (protocol tokens from failed protocols) from the backstop pool.

claimPremiumRewards(uint256[]).notice: Claims premium rewards for multiple pools.

deallocateFromPool(uint256).notice: Finalizes the deallocation of capital from a pool after the notice period.

onCapitalDeposited(address,uint256).notice: Hook called by CapitalPool when an underwriter deposits capital.

onCapitalWithdrawn(address,uint256,bool).notice: Hook called by CapitalPool when capital is withdrawn.

onWithdrawalCancelled(address,uint256).notice: Hook called by CapitalPool when a withdrawal is cancelled.

onWithdrawalRequested(address,uint256).notice: Hook called by CapitalPool when a withdrawal is requested.

realizeLossesForAllPools(address).notice: Realizes pending losses for a user across all their allocated pools.

requestDeallocateFromPool(uint256,uint25.notice: Submits a request to deallocate capital from a specific pool.

setAddresses(address,address,address,add.notice: Sets the addresses of crucial external contracts.

setDeallocationNoticePeriod(uint256).notice: Sets the notice period required for deallocating capital.

setMaxAllocationsPerUnderwriter(uint256).notice: Sets the maximum number of pools an underwriter can allocate to.
